common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_error_unknown
error_list.description: The add on deal created by admin can't be edited

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_item_delete_error
error_list.description: At least one sub item should be added in add on deal

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: The purchase min spend and per gift num is not needed in add on discount

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: The purchase limit is not needed in gift with mini.spend

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: The start time of upcoming add on deal can't be shorted

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: Promotion end time can only be changed to an earlier timing.

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_time_error
error_list.description: The promotion period can't exceed 6 months

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_end_time_error
error_list.description: The end time should be 1 hour later than start time

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_expired
error_list.description: The expired add on deal can't be edited

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_delete_error
error_list.description: Only upcoming add on deal can be deleted

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_name_invalid
error_list.description: The name of add on deal can't exceed 25 characters

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_not_exists
error_list.description: The add on deal not existed

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_update_error
error_list.description: The {value} of ongoing add on deal can't be edited

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_page_no_error
error_list.description: Please input page number between 1-1000

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_page_size_error
error_list.description: Please input page type between 1-100

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_set_error
error_list.description: Please input per gift number between 1 to 50

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: Please input correct promotion purchase limit

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_status_error
error_list.description: Please input correct promotion status:all: 0, ongoing: 1, upcoming: 2, expired: 3

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_set_error
error_list.description: Please input purchase min spend

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: Please enter a discount price less than the original price

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_set_error
error_list.description: Please input add on deal purchase limit between 1 to 100

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_edit_error
error_list.description: Please input correct priority

error_list.name: bundle.bundle_deal_item_under_block_categories
error_list.description: This product is under a category that is prohibited from promotions due to regulations in your country

error_list.name: bundle.bundle_deal_multi_tier_invalid_discount_value_per_item
error_list.description: higher tier should have higher discount per item (discount per item = discount value off / item amount)

error_list.name: bundle.bundle_deal_rule_type_value_error
error_list.description: Wrong rule value

error_list.name: bundle.bundle_deal_max_span_beyond
error_list.description: The promotion period can't exceed 6 months

error_list.name: follow_prize.end_time_max_limit
error_list.description: End time cannot exceed 6 months after start time
